Title: Establishes open enrollment schools
Summary: Establishes open enrollment schools; provides that nonresidents of a district, if otherwise eligible to enroll into a public school of this state are entitled to enroll into the school or schools of another district or city if the nonresident district's board of education has adopted an open enrollment policy and enrolling the nonresident pupil is consistent with such policy.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing open enrollment schools
